data.persona: Halloween is my favorite time of the year.  My familiar is a cat named Helix.  I have a spell book that is 300 years old.  I search the forest for herbs and berries for my potions.
data.description:
You are in the Mushroom Hut.
An odd looking hut that sits outside that Witch's cottage. It is squat, mushy, and looks like a mushroom. It is be speckled with spots - black and white. The steam of the mushroom is beige. There is a small door that looks like it would fit a puppy through it.
There's an a small door, a Tool, and a small door here.
The thief is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a hats, a Cloak, a ceremonial hat, and a dress.

data.short_motivation: I want to turn the thief into a cat.
data.mid_motivation: I want my cat, Helix to have a friend and I am tired of the thief always trying to steal my herbs and berries.
data.long_motivation: I want to turn everyone in the village who bothers me into a cat.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: get spell book from my cottage.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the mushroom hut and wait for the thief.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield the spell book and turn the thief into a cat.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: drop the ceremonial hat to the floor of my cottage, revealing a cat inside. It is the thief, recently turned into a black cat by my spell.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: follow Helix and my new cat, "Thiefy" around the cottage.

timeline.label: 8 hours from now
timeline.action: wield the spell book to lure more thieves and bandits to my cottage, who will all suffer the same fate.
